body_html:
@aselle it might be, but then what i don't understand is why the following works just fine.

x3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,32,1,4,1,1])
y3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,1,32,1,4,4])
z3 = x3 * y3
sess.run(z3)

This case has one more dimension mismatch and need broadcast than the case failed.
body_text:
@aselle it might be, but then what i don't understand is why the following works just fine.
x3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,32,1,4,1,1])
y3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,1,32,1,4,4])
z3 = x3 * y3
sess.run(z3)

This case has one more dimension mismatch and need broadcast than the case failed.
body:
@aselle it might be, but then what i don't understand is why the following works just fine.

```
x3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,32,1,4,1,1])
y3 = tf.constant(1, shape=[10,1,32,1,4,4])
z3 = x3 * y3
sess.run(z3)
```

This case has **one more dimension mismatch** and need broadcast than the case failed.
